inn1.comm: lands it outside off and gets it to seam away gently, hardly any bounce there
fires it full and he shows the full face and pushes it to mid-off
dropped short of slip! Gambhir walks down the pitch before delivery and fends it off, the outside edge goes to second slip on the first bounce
angles it across the right-hander and he shoulders arms
lovely shot, the ball curves back in late, Sehwag gets forward, shows the full face and punches it sweetly past the bowler and mid-off
stays right behind the line and defends solidly
gets beside the line and taps it towards point
gets beside the line again and steers it towards cover
nice cover drive but straight to the fielder, leans onto a half volley
nudges it off his hips and they take a quick leg byt
angles it on middle and leg and he clips it straight to square leg
doesn't move his feet, stays beside it and taps it to point
chases a wide delivery outside off and he misses it
gets forward and drives on the up, he manages to squeeze it past the gap between point and cover
he advances down the track to unsettle the bowler, gets to the pitch of the ball and crashes it past the gap between cover and mid-off
stays back and clips him with soft hands to the on side for a single
the off cuttter, he reads it early, opens the face of the bat and angles it to third man

that's a stunning yorker! Welegedara will want to see this replay a 100 times, he swings it in and lands the ball on the blockhole, Gambhir closes the face of the bat, fails to dig it out and the ball goes straight through and hits the leg stump, too bad the stumps didn't fall
stays back and clips him to the on side
vintage Sehwag, he stands tall to a short delivery, meets the ball in front of his face and clubs it over square leg
gets beside the line and angles it down to third man
stays behind the line and taps it to mid-off
slower ball, opens the face and taps it with soft hands towards first slip
angled on the pads, he clips him behind square on the on side
full outside off, he gets behind the line and drives straight to mid-off
holds the length back, he stays right behind the line and defends
outside off, he gets beside the line and angles it towards square third man
gives him room outside off, Sehwag gets forward, gets his backlift down and thumps it past point, lots of power there
wide again but he chops it down towards cover
he oversteps, fires it full and he digs it out wide of midwicket, they run hard for 3
Free Hit Another overstep! But he fails to put away the free hit, the ball clips his pads and rolls to the off side
Free Hit Not much damage done, comes down the pitch and nearly yorks himself, pushes it down to mid-off
hits a good length on middle and leg, he shuffles and clips him down to deep square leg
stays right behind the line and defends
angles it on the body and he helps it along its way down towards deep square
not bowling to his field there, he drops it short, the ball comes onto him at a comfortable pace and he has enough time to get behind it and club it over midwicket
slashed  and four, wide outside off, the thick outside edge beats the keeper and there are no slips, poor bowling
make that three for the over, he drops it short again, outside off and Sehwag gets on top of the bounce and knocks it over backward point
more on timing this time, leans forward behind the line, a mere defensive push is enough to force it past the bowler
stays beside the line and taps it to point
all power, the bowler gives him a bit of width outside off,  not a bad delivery, Sehwag gets his high backlift down and whacks it past backward point and then beats third man
edged to the keeper but it's an overstep! Comes round the wicket and fires it full, there's an edge to the keeper and Sanga throws the ball up, bad news follows
Free Hit Another overstep! This is plaguing him, full outside off and scooped on the up past cover point
Free Hit Full toss from round the wicket, he tries to club it away but the ball drops in front of mid-on
great reflexes by Sangakkara! Comes round the wicket, Kohli tries to cheekily nudge it down to third man but gets a thick edge, Sanga falls to his right and catches it
that's a bouncer, too high and the umpire penalises him
down the leg side this time, this over will take forever
comes round the wicket, bowls a loosener outside off, he reaches out and scoops it over cover point, poor delivery
full on the off stump and pushed down to mid-off
wide outside off and pitched up, he chases it and scoops it towards sweeper cover, the fielder does well to cut it off
stays back and pushes it to the off side
gives him just a hint of width and he chops it down to the off side
full on the blockhole on middle and leg and he digs it out to the on side
stays beside the line and he steers it to point
good length outside off and tapped towards cover
comes round the wicket, he stays behind the line and defends solidly
very soft dismissal there! The slower ball, Sehwag tries to turn it to the on side but plays too early, he gets a thick leading edge and Thirimanne takes it easily at mid-off
lands outside off and he lets it go
good length on middle and he knocks it to midwicket
lands it outside off and he safely lets it go
keeps it outside the off stump and he shoulders arms
good shot, pitched up outside off, he gets beside the line, meets the ball off the sweetspot and caresses it past backward point
knocks it towards mid-off with soft hands and sets off
he has a wild swish at that one, short outside off, he tries to club it away over square leg and misses it
comes round the wicket, lands outside off and he lets it go
full on the off stump and driven to mid-off
goes for a booming cover drive and nearly ends up edging it, close call
stays beside the line and he taps it to point

almost a run out! Dhoni pushes it towards mid-off and sets off, Yuvraj doesn't want the single so Dhoni turns around, the throw from Kandamby was not on target and Sanga couldn't break the stumps on time
opens the face and steers it wide of backward point
he shapes to drive but the ball clips his pads and heads to the keeper, stifled appeal by Sanga
gets forward and drives down to extra cover
chases a wide delivery without moving his feet too much, he misses it completely
full and wide and again he chases it, Yuvraj still yet to get his eye in
tucks it away to square leg
full outside off and driven down to sweeper cover
a little short and wide outside off, he taps it down to point
full outside off and he drives it down to cover and Kandamby does well to stop it
full on the middle stump and defended
sprays it wide outside the off stump and he defends it away
better one, gets it to angle towards the off stump and Dhoni defends it
full and wide outside off and a mistimed drive finds mid-off
another scratchy shot by Yuvraj, he reaches out without moving his feet to drive and chops it down to slip
that's more the Yuvraj we know, fullish in length outside off, he reaches forward and crisply drives wide of backward point
opens the face of the bat and glides it down to third man
stays behind the line and pushes it towards mid-off
gets behind the line and taps him down to mid-off
clipped wide of midwicket and Pushpakumara hurts himself on the dive, he's in quite a bit of pain, the physio rushes out to check his shoulder
pushes it to the off side
short and wide and slashed hard and in the air towards third man
full on the pads and worked to the on side
reaches out to drive but he ends up chopping it down to cover point
short outside off and Yuvraj tries to upper cut it down to third man but misses
gets behind the line and taps it softly to the on side
good bouncer, Yuvraj wants to hook it at first but he withdraws the shot
he improvises by coming down the pitch and clips him high over midwicket, good shot to ease the pressure
reaches out and slashes him down to sweeper cover, good stop by the fielder
no turn, defended well on the front foot
gets forward and drives firmly to mid-off
tossed up on middle and off, he tucks it to the on side
appeal for a lbw, clips the top flap of the pad perhaps down the leg side
clips it to the on side for a single
rocks back, waits for the turn and chops it down to point
squeezes it out towards mid-on and sets off very quickly for the single, the throw was just wide
full on the pads and he turns the face of the bat and works him wide of midwicket
half volley on middle and he plays a checked drive past the bowler, mid-on runs across to cut it off
slower ball on the pads and he works it to the on side
wide outside off and thumped hard to sweeper cover, there's protection
clipped down to fine leg for a single
full outside off and driven to cover
tossed up on the off stump and defended
gets forward and smothers the spin
gets forward and blocks it away easily
lunges forward and defends
drops it on a good length outside off, he makes room and cuts just wide of point
angles it on the pads and he clips him down to midwicket
hits a good length outside off, he pushes it to the off side
stays back and times the punch very well just wide of mid-off
drops it short of a length and he rocks back and taps it to cover point
slower ball, rocks back and taps it to mid-off
bowls him a yorker outside off and works up a bit of swing, Yuvraj jams it out
gets forward and drives back to the bowler
taps it towards cover and sets off quickly, excellent running by these two
gets forward and defends solidly
gets forward and defends with soft hands
clips him towards short fine leg
that's a cracker, full and wide outside off and he reaches forward and cracks it hard past deep extra cover, the fielder dives in despair
slower ball and Yuvraj doesn't read it well, it slices him in half as the ball sails past the gap between bat and pad
full outside off and driven down to deep cover
short and wide outside off, he reaches out and thumps it hard past backward point
tossed up on middle and leg and clipped to mid-on
makes room and cuts to deep point
tosses it up outside off and lands it on the half volley, he drives firmly to sweeper cover
attempts a paddle sweep but plays too early, the ball clips his pads and rolls away
drops it short, he whips it across the line to long-on
quicker through the air and defended on the front foot
tossed up outside off and pushed to the covers
fails to pull a short delivery, the ball clips his pads and rolls to the on side
gets forward and tucks it to long-on
gets forward and defends
lunges forward and pushes it towards mid-on
lunges forward and pushes it towards mid-on
gets forward and turns it away towards square leg
gets forward and sweeps to fine leg
pushes a single to deep point
tossed up outside off and cut to point
tossed up on middle and clipped to the on side
gets away with a full toss, Yuvraj swats it but finds deep square lgg
gets forward and drives to the off side
chips down the track and lofts but finds long-on, one bounce
full and pushed down the ground to long-on
full on middle and pushed to mid-on
stays back and clips with the turn to short fine leg
tucks it just wide of midwicket
gets well forward and defends
gets well forward and defends
pushed through quick and flat, he pushes it back to the bowler
stays back and chops it to the off side
pressed forwarded and defended
pressed forwarded and defended
gets forward and pushes it towards point
tossed up on middle and off, defended on the front foot
gets forward and pushes him to the off side
flatter and quicker, he tucks it away to square leg
tossed up on middle and leg and clipped to mid-on
that was a seam up delivery, drops it on a good length and he goes back and pulls him over midwicket
full on the leg stump and he drives it down the ground to long-on
too wide down the leg side, he could have whacked that
take that! Kandamby tosses it up on middle and off, he gets on his knee and slogs him over deep midwicket, that went rows back
brings up his 50 in style by clubbing a full toss over long-on
gets forward and smothers the spin
tossed up on middle and squeezed to the off side
pitched outside leg, turning away, gets forward and defends
gets onto the front foot and drives it to long-on for one
Dhoni goes for the big one this time, Samaraweera follows him as he sees his make room, Dhoni is too close to the pitch of the ball and gets just one to square leg
driven down the ground, put pressure on Kulasekara by running the first one hard. Kula fumbles, and gives away two
chips down the track and drives it down to long-on
another shimmy down the wickets, gets him a single down to long-on
smacked away hard, square of the wicket, but straight to point

he has got him this time, the partnership stays at 99. Slightly loose shot, sees a short delivery, throws his bat at it, gets a thick outside edge - perhaps because it's too close to him - and Sangakkara takes a good diving catch to his right. What a first wicket for Perera
angled across him, defended towards point
gets off the mark by bunting one towards midwicket
powerful cut shot, but straight to point

big shout for lbw, not given, Yuvraj is lucky here, the pitches just inside the mat, straightens a touch, and was going onto hit the leg stump. To make it worse for Sri Lanka, they missed a direct hit that could have run Raina out, who was wanting a leg-bye but was sent back
short and wide, and Raina cuts it sweetly to the right of deep point
wide outside off, Raina shoulders arms
watchful again, lets it go outside off
stands tall in the crease and defends
high elbow, on-the-up drive, straight to mid-off
goes in for a friendly little bouncer, Raina sways out of the way
stump to stump again, just back of a length, Yuvraj goes deep into the crease and defends
gives him room, draws a loose shot out of Yuvraj, who misses by about a foot when going for the big booming drive
goes back to the stump-to-stump line, and Yuvraj defends it towards midwicket
can't keep Yuvraj for too long, this is driveable length, and wide enough, Yuvraj gets under it and clears extra cover
angling across him, Yuvraj drops and runs and gets a single
swing and a miss, big big swing, wanted to send it to Kolkata perhaps, but made connection with only air
nice, in the channel, Yuvraj comes forward and defends
elementary error from Kandamby at point, Yuvraj square-drove, Kandamby didn't make allowance for the spin, and cost his team three runs
Raina comes forwards, plays it with soft hands and rushes through for one
another forward-defensive
special shot, this time the bowler got too close to him, and Yuvraj drove it with an open face, to beat extra cover, and get four, all along the ground
big stride in, and defends this one
and he beats Raina this time, outside off, looks to run it down to third man but the ball goes with the angle and eludes him
tucks him up with a back-of-a-length delivery, defended to leg
digs it in short, Raina looks for the cut, but a touch of extra bounce beats him
weak bouncer, 124ks, and pulled away handsomely, and deep midwicket has to run to its right to keep them to two
opens his face and runs it down to third man
flicked away off the pads, easy single
back of a length, pushed away to wide of mid-off
wide, too wide, starts wide and keeps going with the angle
looks to run this one down to third man, is early into the shot, gets it to point
goes deep into the crease and defends an accurate delivery to cover

drama here, Raina stands his ground and is rewarded. Raina looks to run this down to third man, gets an edge that is forever dying on Sanga, who claims a clean catch. Taufel has a look at square leg and rules him out. Raina doesn't hurry off the field, and the replays show it might have just bounced in front of Sanga, and so says the third umpire and Taufel reverses his decision. Close but enough doubt
works away one off his pads for a single
long hop, is pulled away, fine leg comes around and saves the boundary
length ball, driven on the up, wide of mid-off
driven down the ground this time, gets a single
doesn't get power into the cut shot, it limply goes off towards cover
slower ball, driven to right of mid-off for a single
caught at boundary, Perera is having a superb match, bouncer, Yuvraj pulls off the front foot, gets the higher part of the bat, and Lakmal doesn't have to move much at the deep midwicket boundary
back of a length, on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
looks to guide a widish delivery to third man, finds point
no cute half measures this time, gets one short and wide, gets under it, and cuts it over point
slower ball, back of a length, no room, played towards cover
quick single, just drop it at his feet and called Jadeja straight away
short ball, into the body, takes his eyes off it, and gets away without getting solid hit in the arms
fuller, gives him width, and he opens the face and gets a single
almost a third wicket for Perera, Jadeja gets his front foot too far across when defending, gets an inside edge that saves him the lbw
guides this one past point, and square of third man
goes too far across again, and again the inside edge saves him. Perea is bowling from close to the stumps, and it's dangerous to walk across to him
driven to sweeper-cover for one
slower bouncer, Raina looks to glide it down to third man, but is off timing and is beaten
this is the regulation short and wide delivery asking to be hit and Raina obliges, getting under it and cutting it over point
works it around the corner for one
flatter delivery, Raina wants a single to short third but is sent back, and rightly so
angled into the pads, and worked away for a single
slower delivery, nice flight, gets a bit of a bite, and Jadeja defends
gets onto the front foot and works it around it for a single
flatter ball into the pads, and they take a sharp single to short fine leg
nice shot straight down the ground, on the up, high elbow, straight of mid-off, just backing away and making room to do so
slower ball goes wrong, down the leg side
length ball, driven down the ground for one
back of a length, angled across, drops and runs and gets Raina on strike
slower ball, Raina cuts but can't beat backward point
another slower ball, Raina goes for the slightly ungainly pull and is way too early into the shot
back up to pace, is accurate, and is driven towards cover for no run
into the pads, and helped away to square leg
dances down the track, and the mis-hit lands safe
into the pads, Jadeja fails to make contact
no room again, will go for only a single, towards midwicket
well bowled, nicely flighted, pitching middle, straightening a touch, and defended
Jadeja wants a sharp single to short fine, Raina doesn't and sends him back - but this was the non-striker's call
yorker outside off, a single to cover
short, tucks him up, they get a single just off the square
length ball, misses out, and gets just a single to sweeper-cover
well bowled and even better shot, it's a yorker but gives him a bit of width and he opens the face and gets it fine of short third man
length is right, but the line is wrong again, a yorker way down the leg side

bouncer, slightly down the leg side and it;s not called a wide. Refreshing to see an umpire not being harsh on a wide call, but bemusing to see him not signal byes either. Surely Raina ducked safely and made no contact
length ball, and driven to sweeper-cover for one
nice, gentle loosener put away, length ball, on the pads and he clears his front leg and goes over mid-on
and one more for Jadeja, this time he pitches it up and gives him width, Jadeja gets under it and gets it over mid-off, hits the boundary skirting on the full
Jadeja is cashing in here, too full this time, and on the pads, and he flicks it square of short fine. Thushara is doing anything but bowl to his field
this is a beautiful shot, best of the lot, because he is made to find the gap here, and he drives it between mid-off and extra cover
gets the yorker right this time, the inside edge gets Jadeja a single
sees a length ball, goes the big slog, mis-hits, but gets a single to deep square leg
driven on the up, can't pierce the cover field here
gets length, clears the front leg and swipes it towards midwicket
slower ball, short outside off, and he bunts it to points and runs
half-volley, can't get the timing right and gets just one, to mid-on
bowled him, superb yorker, swinging in towards middle and leg, Raina is looking to do too much with an open face, but the ball sneaks under the bat. Too good a delivery to try a cute shot
another yorker, digs it out, but gets just a single towards mid-off
and he gets a wicket, what is Harbhajan up to? Moves across the stumps too early, Thushara bowls it full and wide, and Harbhajan looks to slash it to the off side but ends up spooning it to point
low fulltoss, turned away towards midwicket for one
dropped by Tharanga at sweeper-cover, this is a limp little chip shot over the covers and Tharanga drops a sitter
gives him length to get under, but he mis-hits, and gets a single to long-off
backs away, Thushara smartly angles it across him and gets a dot delivery
again he backs away too early, again Thushara goes full and wide, this time Zaheer manages to make contact and take a single to cover
high five for Welegedara! Zaheer backs away again, leaving the stumps exposed, and Welegedara bowls stump to stump, hitting the top of the middle stump. Welegedara is elated with this fifth wicket
another dot ball, beats the outside edge as he looks to poke outside off
and again, Nehra too is backing away and looking to poke at it, the angle takes the ball away and another dot ball results
he makes contact now, but hits it straight towards cover
low fulltoss, and Nehra gets it down to long-on for a single
yorker, just outside off, just a single, what an over from Welegedara
has Kulasekara dropped him at long-off? Jadeja charged down and ended up slicing it towards long-off, but it didn't quite carry
floater, Jadeja misses a leg-stump delivery
arm ball, quick, beats Jadeja's attempt to cut
dropped, a tough return catch, drilled back to the bowler who can't hold onto it
mis-hits the slog, but gets one to midwicket
a mis-hit perfectly placed, Nehra looks for the big shot, gets the top edge, that lands smack between long-on and long-off
length ball, but Jadeja moves his front leg away and slogs and doesn't get the timing right
that's No. 9, slower bouncer, Jadeja goes for the pull, is early into the shot, and is caught at midwicket, at the edge of the circle
nice copy-book defensive shot off the back foot and they rush through for a single
yorker, he digs it out, and gets a single to short third man
comedy of errors, Sreesnath walks down the track, Thushara slips in a slow bouncer, but they come through for a bye, Thushara tries to run Sreesanth out and ends up giving away an overthrow
dances down the track, hits it back to the bowler, dot ball to finish

inn2.comm: slightly early into the drive to a length delivery, straight towards mid-off
misses the radar, goes way down the leg side
chipped over the covers, gets onto the front foot, meets the ball, doesn't look to hit it too hard, just get it over the in-field. Ominous sings for India, that timing
hint of swing away, Tharanga shoulders arms
again shape away from the left-hand batsman, Tharanga covers the off stump and shoulders arms
gets closer to the stumps this time, and Tharanga is drawn into the shot, the swing misses the outside edge by inches
nicely helped through the covers, again doesn't look for the powerful drive, just meets it with an open face and it speeds along extra cover, and Raina has to chase and make a diving save
that's too good, just too good to get an edge, angled in, pitches middle, moves away, misses the bat and the off stump, what a peach
gets some swing again, this time Tharanga defends it off the middle of the bat
digs this one in, tucks him up, and Tharanga stands tall and defends
back of a length, punches it towards cover, where Kohli makes a diving save
played with soft hands, to the right of cover, and comes through for one
back of a length, straightens a touch, and is defended into the covers
length delivery, angling into the batsman, and defended towards mid-on
hint of swing again, lets it be outside off
this time pulls the length back, on target, Tharanga defends off the front foot
risky single, just drops it towards mid-on and runs, Yuvraj runs in and goes for the underarm, and misses
slashes outside off and misses, back of a length, just outside off, and misses the outside edge
slashes at it again, and gets a thick outside edge, and Sreesanth makes a diving save at third man to keep them down to two
back of a length, shaping away, and defended towards cover
crunchy shot, but straight towards Kohli at short cover, that fielder is placed well for Tharanga, covers are his favourite area
and he misses the outside edge again, angled in again, and then swinging away, making him play and then moving too much to get the edge
shout for lbw but this one is going down the leg side, Tharanga is expecting it to swing
edged away for four, gets the false shot out, but the third man is too square with the ball swinging
another peach, this is a special spell of bowling, he is moving it away beautifully after angling it in. Tharanga has to play at it again, and is beaten again
length delivery, around the off line, and defended towards cover
swing this time, but this starts too far outside off
half-volley outside off, and it's important they cash in on loose deliveries. And Thirimanne gets four through the square-drive, between cover-point and cover
shorter delivery, the batsman is still on the front foot, and is accordingly beaten by the extra bounce
can't control the swing here, slides it down the leg side, and it swings viciously away and would have been a wide in Tests too
guided down to third man, got the width this time
more width and he threads the strong off-side field, rolls the wrists too, to keep it down
angled into the pads, misses out on a free hit, gets one to fine leg
shortish, moving away from an off line, and pushed to cover
another false shot, looks to swipe from outside off, gets the bottom edge that bounces over the stumps
fuller, swinging away, played with an open face, towards cover
he goes past the outside edge once again, it's the same story, angling in, swinging away, the batsman is drawn into a defensive shot and ends up playing inside the line
and again, this is shorter, still moves away, still beats the edge
misses his line this time, gets too straight, but it will be just a single to fine leg
uppishly driven through the covers, but the key is he has found the gap. It was a length delivery that gave him room, and he threw his arms at it
width again, length delivery again, and crashed through the covers, all along the ground, and Sreesanth is given a rough welcome
now it swings into the left-hander, but he is equal to it, giving it the full face of the bat
best of the trhee cover-drives, he has got the width again, gets down on a knee and eases it through extra cover, no power, all timing
back of a length, outside off, runs it down to third man
full delivery, driven straight to mid-off
back of a length, tucks him up
looks to whip it to the leg side, gets an inside edge onto the pad
opens his face on a fullish delivery, can't get it past point
gets across to outside off to go for the pull, but is beaten by the extra bounce
chance for a run-out, driven to left of mid-off, Zaheer gets a foot to it, Thiri is late to start for the single, but Zaheer is off balance and can't get a good throw in
length ball, angling in, defended towards cover
short outside off and flat-batted towards mid-off
length ball, driver down to mid-off
taken, finally a wicket, this time he tries to manufacture a pull shot, walking across the stumps, but the ball is not short enough and he gets a top edge that lobs to Gambhir at square leg
accurate, around the off, defended back to the bowler
driven but the bat face turns in his hand, and short cover takes it on the first bounce
lovely shot, hardly looking to hit it, just steers this shortish delivery square of backward point, superb timing
short into the ribs, turned away to leg
goes for a bouncer, slips it down the leg side
fuller, angling in towards the off stump, defends towards midwicket
goes chasing a swinging delivery, is beaten outside off, it's called a wide, that's harsh, that went inside the wide marker
another one too good to take the edge, angles in, pitches just outside off, leaves Sanga, beats the poke
oversteps, lands on the line so correct call, back of a length, defended towards point
makes room , takes a shortish delivery and goes over point, gets the toe end but it's enough to get him four
worked away into the on side, uppishly but safe and through the midwicket gap
goes driving at a widish delivery, and gets the toe end of the bat, one bounce to short cover
looks to tuck him up, but slides down the leg side
back of a length, cramps him around off stump, can't get any power into the attempted cut
slower ball, into the pads, gets an inside edge onto the pads
almost played on, looks for the big, booming drive but the ball is too close to him, and coming in with the angle from round the stumps, the pad saves him
inside edge onto the pad again, this time he is looking to defend and has his body covering the stumps
short, punched off the front foot, to right of cover, and gets a single
almost through the bat-ad gap, looks for the big drive again and is done in by the angle, the inside edge goes towards midwicket
too full, driven convincingly, but straight to mid-on
too full again, driven to mid-off this time
driven straight again, not too much power, gets a single
good sharp bouncer, Tharanga is clearly surprised, and is late in ducking
short of driving length, no room, all he can do is defend
misses out on a delivery short and wide, cuts it straight towards point
angling into Sanga, short of driving length, and defended towards midwicket
back of a length, no room, played towards mid-off
driven on the up, can't pierce the off-side field
slower legcutter, flummoxes Sanga, big appeal ensues, but it's going down the leg side
mis-hit, looks to pull from outside off, gets the toe end of the bat but just about clears mid-off
goes for the big slog over midwicket and misses it by at least a foot
looks to turn a delivery to leg, gets a leading edge, all along the ground for one
gets on a knee, looks to drive through the covers, bat handle turns in the hand and ends up playing it back to Zaheer
pushes a shortish delivery towards point
quick single just to the left to Jadeja at point, early call, fast running, no problems
square-drives, but straight to point
drives on the up, but sweeper-cover is in place and he gets a single
floated wide, driven, Gambhir fumbles at sweeper-cover, and one is converted into two
back of a length, tucks him up, played to point
looks to cut, there is width all right, but no foot movement and the extra bounce beats him
guided through the covers for one
short outside off, guides it down to third man
guided to third man again for a single
round the wicket, and there is turn here, and bounce, Tharanga lets it be outside off
flatter delivery now, cut away, but straight to point
flighted, not much room, played back to the bowler
soft dismissal, is looking to drive, the ball doesn't turn much and he checks his shot and lobs back a simple catch to Harbhajan
turn, sharp turn, turned to Karthik at forward short leg, one bounce
outside off, lets it be
short delivery, pushed down to long-on for one
again shortish, and pushed down to long-on for one
flighted, not much turn, no room, played back to the bowler
just outside off, forced to cover for one, a mini collision between Sanga and Sehwag - all seems fine
turning into the pads, worked away for one
straight, flighted delivery, played back to the bowler
no turn, Samaraweera plays for it, gets the inside half of the bat
steps out but manages to get it back to the bowler
this is flatter, Samaraweera is expecting it, waits and waits, and opens the face, past the slip, all along the ground
slower, but seemed to hurry up upon pitching, played towards cover
steps put again, gets too close to it, and plays it back to the bowler
sits back looking for a flatter delivery to late-cut, but the backward point is well stationed
nice flight, no room, defended back to the bowler
topspinner, angling in, defended towards mid-on
drops and runs, Samaraweera responds and they are both home safe
smart batting, gets across, and paddles it fine, uses the bowler's pace and gets four
late cut, nice shot, past the slip, square of third man
turning in, waits on it, and pushes it to cover for one
nice shot, Samaraweera is quietly running away, another late cut, rocks onto the back foot, and finds the gap between backward point and cover-point
arm ball, Samaraweera is waiting back, and it skids upon pitching, almost going through his defence
cut away, Gambhir fumbles at cover-point, they get a single
paddles from way across, and just about manages to get some bat, almost beaten by the turn
more orthodox, pushed down to long-on
flighted around off, driven back to the bowler
driven on the up, down the ground, gets a single to long-off
pitched up, driven down to long-on
back of a length, pushed through the off side for one
quicker one, Samarwerra rocks back and punches it down to long-on
too full, easily driven to long-off for one
short, cut away, deep point cuts it off
gets onto the front foot and pushes it to wide of cover for one
plays for the turn, gets a leading edge, back to the bowler but along the ground
very nice chip shot, dances down the track, knows he doesn;t want to hit the leather off the ball, just lofts it over midwicket
and follows it up with a single to long-on
looks to drive down the ground, gets too close to it, and ends up playing it back to the bowler
slightly shorter, waits for it, opens the face, and gets it left enough of sweeper-cover to get three
flighted outside off, gets onto the front foot and defends
and slightly short and Samaraweera goes back and uses the bowler's pace again, left of sweeper-cover; he has been good on anything even slightly short
and beats him straight away with a ball that angles across him, while Samaraweera plays for the spin
and again, he pokes at it, playing for the spin, but this one turns away, and bounces
shorter this time, and he gets an easy single to cover
leading edge as he looks for a single to midwicket, but gets one to point
full and wide, and driven to sweeper-cover
floated just outside off, not turning, defended by Samaraweera
shorter and flatter, misses his pad by inches and is called wide
another flat delivery misses it mark by inches
this one slips out of his hand, a gentle fulltoss outside off, and driven to sweeper-cover
flat and straight, defended back to the bowler
short, fast, 93ks, helped away to deep point
flighted just outside off, comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
slightly short, cut away, to the right of sweeper cover, and they come through for two
full, on the pads, but can't beat midwicket
nicely bowled, flighted, on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
another slow teasing delivery, pushed down the ground for one
topspinner, Samaraweera gets onto the front foot and pushes it down to long-off
tossed up, almost yorks him, defended back to the bowler
short, pushed with soft hands to wide of long-off, two is the early call but they decide against it
flat and fast, 92ks, pushed back to Yuvraj
slows it down a touch, pushed down to long-on for one
generously flighted, driven down the ground, gets a single to long-off
short, forced away to sweeper-cover for another single

it's all slipper out here, the ball slips out of Yuvraj's hand and turns out to be a fulltoss, which is driven to sweeper-cover, and Samaraweera slips while going for the second. Sangakkara almost slips while turning back but manages his balance
continuing round the wicket, and another impressive shot, it's slightly short, he waits for it, takes it from in front of the stumps and places it wide of sweeper-cover
flatter, on the pads, worked away for one
Samaraweera wants a quick single, but is sent back by Sangakkara, it has gone straight to the fielder
jumps out of the crease, takes it on the full, and lofts it over midwicket, smart batting, that is the occasional boundary that they need
arm ball from Harbhajan, cramps Sangakkara up
short and flat, cut away to sweeper-cover for one
driven on the up, to Sehwag at sweeper-cover
short, Samaraweera looks to turn it to leg, but can't get it off the square
another accurate delivery, just outside off, and defended to cover
length ball, driven but can't beat mid-off
nice bowling now, short of driving length, just outside off, straightening a touch, squares him up slightly
short, stays low a fraction, short-arm pull to fine leg for one
looks for the late cut past short third, but is hurried into the shot and doesn't find the gap
again looks to go square and gets a single to deep point
short, pushed down the ground, gets a single
flighted, skids on, Samaraweera looks for the late cut again, and is beaten, inches away from the edge
plays the front foot shot this time, a single to sweeper-cover
flighted outside off, pushed back to the bowler
gives him the charge, drives, but gets just a single to sweeper-cover
into the ribs, worked away for a single to fine leg
short ball, hurries him into the pull shot, which is top-edged but clears square leg, Sreesanth has Samaraweera in an uneasy place right now
slower delivery, dabs it to point and runs
short ball, smashed square, Jadeja fumbles at point, gives away a single
oversteps, that undoes a good over, a single to third man
slower ball but a high fulltoss, another Sree hit on its way, Samaraweera gets down on a knee and scoops it over short fine leg. Asking to be hit, and another free hit to come
Samaraweera cashes in, what a way to get to fifty, backs away, takes a short delivery and crashes it over extra cover
short and wide, and cut away wide of sweeper-cover, becomes the fifth Sri Lankan to get to 8000 ODI runs
gets onto the front foot and pushes it to long-off
rocks onto the back foot and cuts it away for one
big shout for lbw, this one goes in with the arm, it's full and straight, but the inside edge saves him
full ball, pushed to mid-on
flighted delivery, just outside off, and defended back towards the bowler
length ball, driven down to mid-off
shorter, worked away off the hips for one
50 for Sanga, gets on the front foot, opens the face of the bat, gets a single to third man
gets across the stumps, pushes this one down to mid-on
full delivery, angling across him, helped away to third man
too close to cut, which Sanga tries, but is safe, playing it one bounce to point
angling into the pads, played towards midwicket
dances down the track, and places it wide of long-on and gets two
flatter delivery, cramping him up, played back to the bowler
thrown up this time, pushed down the ground
chips down the track and pushes it down to long-off
chip shot and misfielded at midwicket boundary by Harbhajan, it's lofted over midwicket, Harbhajan gets around but doesn't bend properly and the ball skids through on the wet outfield
looks to run it down to third man, and is beaten
length ball, into the pads, helped away towards midwicket
length ball, pushed down the ground
bouncer attempted, pulled away all along the ground for a single to fine leg
charges down the wicket, connects but can't beat mid-off
back of a length, guided down to third man
Sangakkara steps out of his crease, doesn't get to the pitch of the ball and gets hit on the pad
he steps out again, doesn't get to the pitch again but this time he lofts down the ground for two
Sangakkara cuts and finds the gap in the infield, the outfield is slow because of the dew
pushed off the back foot towards long on for a single
Sangakkara stays in his crease this time and punches towards midwicket
pushed through the off side for a single to end the over
played off the pads through square leg and Sangakkara sets off in a tearing hurry
precise placement, Samaraweera jumps down the track, moves towards leg to make room, and launches the ball inside out over extra cover, the ball bounces just inside the boundary
defended on the off side
Samaraweera comes down the track, Jadeja bowls faster and shorter, the batsman cuts to point
edged but it's very fine and will run down to the boundary, Samaraweera was trying to cut but didn't have enough room
Samaraweera nudges the ball towards square for a single
Samaraweera nudges the ball towards deep square for one
caught! Harbhajan flights it and gives Sangakkara room, he reaches out and tries to drive through cover and ends up hitting it straight to Raina, Sangakkara's angry with himself as he walks off
he gets going with a cut off the back foot
fired down leg side, Samaraweera plays the glance but straight to short fine leg
nudged off the back foot towards point for a single
played towards midwicket
pushed off the front foot towards cover
nudged off the pads towards fine leg
Kandamby tires to push on the leg side but doesn't make contact
defended on the front foot, Kandamby came out of his crease and was beaten in the flight, close call
defended more confidently this time
pushed gently towards point for a single
flighted outside off, defended towards point
gets onto the front foot and pushes it wide of cover for a single
dances down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball, and gets a single to long-on
driven away powerfully, but straight to long-off
worked away into the on side for another single
good strike to keep the pressure back on India, slightly short, slightly wide, and perfectly cut away square of sweeper-cover and slightly fine of backward point
flat delivery, pushes him into the crease, and defended back to the bowler
beats him outside off, nice flight, turn, beats a defensive poke, Dhoni removes the bails but he never left the crease. Third umpire says not out
chips down the track, makes room, goes inside-out, just wide of a diving Raina at extra cover
waits for a flatter delivery, but Yuvraj keeps it slow and he can't guide it past short third
steps out of the crease again, Yuvraj pulls back the length, and he is forced to defend
short, and cut away towards deep point for one
short and flat, helped away to square of third man for a couple
looks for the cut, but it is too close to do so, and ends up playing limply towards cover
worked off the pads, but Yuvraj keeps them down to a dot, at short fine
this time he gets it squarer, and gets a single
are we onto something here? Kandamby plays an ill-advised slog-sweep here. It's invitingly flighted by Harbhajan, and he gets a top edge, and holes out to midwicket
Samaraweera comes forward and pushes it back to mid-on
ordinary cricket from Yuvraj, full delivery, pushed back to him, he looks to stop it with his foot and the ball slides underneath
short, slow, he is almost having to reach for it, gets a single
slows it down again, and it's pushed to cover-point
arm ball, on target, and is defended back
short ball, and pushed down to long-on for one
another arm ball, big shout too, but hitting outside the line
worked away off the pads for a single
topspinner, stays bat, and pushes it back to the bowler. Every dot ball piling the pressure on
looks to sweep, misses it, and it almost bounces off his forearm onto the stumps, saved by the spin
another dot ball, looks to run it down but can't beat short third man
single, worked away to square leg, good over from Harbhajan so far
topspinner, on the pads, helped away for a single, end of Harbhajan's 10 - well bowled - 47 for 3
makes room, and takes a risky single to point, he would have been gone had Jadeja hit here
sharp bouncer, Randiv is looking to give him the charge and is hit in the glove while looking to get out of the way. The ball lands safely, though

another wicket goes, run-out that too, Samaraweera makes room, Nehra follows him, the balls off the pad, Randiv wants a leg-bye, but is sent back, and slips while turning, and it's an easy run-out for Dhoni and Nehra
makes room, slashes, misses by a long way
this time he connects, gets into the 90s with this four, big shot, makes room, gets under the short delivery and cuts it over the covers
makes room, Nehra floows him with a slower ball, and this time they come through for a leg-bye
shot, superb shot, it's a poor loosener all right, but he puts it away perfectly, length ball, wide, driven square, not a fielder in the covers moves
back of a length, cramps him up, pushed back to the bowler
Samaraweera is showing no nerves, another good pull shot, short delivery and he beats midwicket in the circle, and Kohli, running in from deep backward square, has to put in the dive to save four
misses out on a fulltoss, the bat slips out of his hand, and he hits it straight towards mid-off
yorker this time, digs it out, takes a single to mid-off

with a strong on-side field, he gives him length and width, and it is spanked through the off-side field, superb shot first up. Remember Perera stunned India in a one-dayer earlier too, we are in for some finish
have India missed a big opportunity, slower ball, Samaraweera hits straight to Jadeja at point, wants a run is sent back, gives up, Jadeja misses the only stump he can see by mere inches
he makes room again, and Nehra follows him with a slower delivery and beats him
another slower ball, this time he stands his ground and works it towards fine leg for one
two balls, two fours for Perera, what a player, Nehra misses the yorker by inches and he goes inside-out and pierces the off-side field from outside leg
fulltoss, lofted over the on-side field, Gambhir runs around from deep square leg and keeps them down to two
this is a big big delivery for Sri Lanka, length ball, on the pads, huge no-ball, and Perera flicks it off to the square-leg boundary

ho ho ho, Perera where have you been hiding? He is going to finish it off soon, gets a nice juicy fulltoss on the pads, and smacks it flat over the square-leg boundary. He is 20 off 5, strike-rate of 400

super hundred for Samarweera, just opens the face gently and comes through for a single. Off comes the helmet, and he gesticulates towards the dressing room, a sort of forward defensive air shot, but left-handed
a rare dot ball from Perera, can't get under this yorker
Perera you beauty, low fulltoss, and absolutely crashed through extra cover. What else does Zaheer have?
that's hit him in the ribs, Perera is looking to make room, Zaheer follows him with a short delivery and gets him flush
hit in the ribs, what hit in the ribs? If you bowl a low fulltoss, it's still going, wide of mid-off, and Sri Lanka are almost there. Perera is playing a blinder
bouncer, and he gets a dot ball, 11 off 3 overs now
slower ball, and Samaraweera joins the party, on the pads and flicked away over square leg, clean clean shot
almost gets this through extra cover, Raina makes a diving save, and Samaraweera goes to his personal best in ODIs

straight loft, Kohli makes a diving save at long-on, and his trousers come off as he dives, and Yuvraj can't control his laughter. Perera has already hit the pants off the ball, now it's the fielders losing them
another no-ball, it's a dot, and will it be game over for off the next free hit?

Zaheer takes a catch running back from mid-on, but neither Samaraweera nor Zaheer realise that there could be runs taken here. Samaraweera thinks Perera is out, Zaheer and Yuvraj celebrate. No one realises it's a free hit. Well done us
misses a short delivery, but it's a matter of time now
full ball, lofted over wide long-on and it's a job well finished by Perera and Samaraweera
